item.title: Public footpath no longer visible or maintained., 4th January
item.description:
The public footpath that runs either side of Syringa Farm. One side runs NE from the farm and joins another public footpath. The other side runs SW from Syrings Farm over a field and to the corner of Hently Bank Community Woods.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Sandy Pluck Lane, Badgeworth, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fairview Road puddles since resurfacing, 4th January
item.description:
This road was resurfaced in November. Multiple drains are blocked with the debris from resurfacing, and some areas have not been laid properly and now pool water. the drainage channel outside machine Mart is completely blocked and a lake forms here

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 93, Fairview Road, Ewens Farm, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Inadequate street lighting in Mill Street Prestbury Cheltenham, 3rd January
item.description:
I was walking up from the Burgage at 6.00pm on Friday 19th December and noticed one street light in the whole street which is very long. When I was nearly outside the Plough Inn I literally could not see in front of my face..it was so dark that I fell heavily ..I badly skinned both my knees and bruised my left leg..they are still healing. I was going to see St Mary's Choir but the garden was far too crowded and I was shaken up. I went home with my dog and didn't leave the house over the weekend. The street lighting is totally inadequate outside the public house..their garden was well lit where the choir was but there were far too many people there. I would like you to survey this street and report your findings to me...it could have been more serious if I had fell into the street with passing traffic. It was witnessed by my friend at that time and it happened at 18.10pm.. Hazel Bruckel

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 3, Cromwell Road, Lynworth, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: This car has been parked and therefore blocking the use of an EV bay since mid December. It had 3 parking tickets on 19th Dec but even the traffic wardens seem to have stopped issuing parking tickets. I think it has been ambandomed, but even if not it is preventing the use of 25% of the EV bays Sherborne Street Cheltenham, 3rd January
